replies.body:
For me it all started with my friend giving this song as an MP3 for me...

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0nlJuwO0GDs

Before joining I eventually found the Misadventures of {{champion:45}} and {{champion:117}} from the old boards... Here I am now as a {{champion:90}} main who LOVES dabbling in the dark arts with {{champion:45}} ... Memes are just an added bonus for me now.
That video also got me into league. It did its job well.

He actually only gave me the MP3 of the song and had NO clue what it was from! XD Did some research and found it... Jinx is also one of my favorite Marksman. I just love her wacky personality. He had this all planned and knew I would enjoy {{champion:222}}, I swear to {{champion:17}} he knew without me ever playing it before!

{{champion:222}}  personality(s) vs {{champion:150}} 's taunt (CHUGIE CHUGIE CHUUUGIEEE)
Good game.
I miss the Misadventures of Veigar and Lulu jesus that was eons ago.
Yeah it was wasn't it... Its also what got me into wanting to play {{champion:45}} and {{champion:117}} . Both are REALLY fun to play!
That comic got me to play LoL
It was the final nail in my coffin.
Not gonna lie, this made me discover my massive hard-on for Jinx
sure was a sweet vid
I think its hilarious!
option four. I have put too much money in to leave now.
Sunk cost fallacy
I put in too much money and I'm still leaving.
http://thewritepractice.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/05/Alot-vs-a-lot1-600x450.png

> [{quoted}](name=ViashinoWizard,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=eHWG5Oru,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-06-14T16:09:42.939+0000)
>
> http://thewritepractice.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/05/Alot-vs-a-lot1-600x450.png

Hyperbole and a Half rocks. Too bad the author stopped posting.
I've never played Alot. Is she op?

i don't play overwatch and i don't have problems.

it's high noon my dudes.
I thought people played so they could complain about every change
there should be a survey like that when you join league for the first time and it should result in what queue you can play {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
*ignore this post, testing*
_**IGNORING INTENSIFIES**_
I used to play because of Solo Q
I play it because it's fun and to try get higher rank than my tryhard friend who has no life and plays ranked instead of school etc.
**Dank Memes**
{{item:3070}} {{champion:44}} {{item:3070}}  the memes are too strong
For me it was seeing gameplay of Rumble. I loved the concept of a fuzzy asshat in a giant robot.
http://pix.iemoji.com/images/emoji/apple/ios-9/256/ballot-box-with-bold-check.png So I can have empty hopes of being gold
☒ Because the last one is the only one with proper grammar
I don't know, there are only 2 words without capitals and one of them is supposed to have one.

> [{quoted}](name=Dr Poro,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=eHWG5Oru,comment-id=000c0000,timestamp=2016-06-14T19:01:25.624+0000)
>
> I don't know, there are only 2 words without capitals and one of them is supposed to have one.

It's the author's stylistic choice. They want to emphasize the key words in the sentence.

edit: adding a kappa just in case

Although I will say, one of my favorite quotes (from a high school English teacher) is

>All grammar rules are hard and fast -- until you have a good reason to break them. [...] the corollary being that if you want to break them, you better have a good reason.

(second part paraphrased because it was a long time ago and my memory isn't perfect)
Don't say it unless you meme it!
I continue to play league because I hate myself!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
I joined to learn the feeling of ~~friendship~~ hate.
What about #4? To avoid withdrawal
